main.description: Request that the server re-resolve an identity (DID and handle). The server may ignore this request, or require authentication, depending on the role, implementation, and policy of the server.

handle.description: The validated handle of the account; or 'handle.invalid' if the handle did not resolve successfully.

tombstoned.description: If true, the DID has been deleted, and the other optional fields should be null.

didDoc.description: The complete DID document for the identity.
